issue.title: TrackedVehiclePlugin: Angular Velocity Stored in Quaternion

content.raw:
This was already requested in [#!/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/2652/added-support-for-tracked-vehicles/diff#comment-112077504](#!/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/2652/added-support-for-tracked-vehicles/diff#comment-112077504) .

I sent the fix for it some time ago: [#!/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/3116/added-cmd\_vel\_twist-control-topic-to/diff](#!/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/3116/added-cmd_vel_twist-control-topic-to/diff) . However, it still hasn’t got a second review to get accepted. I’ll welcome if you leave a note in the PR that you’re another person interested in getting it merged.
